chapters.title: A New Beginning
chapters.content: Little Sparky couldn't believe what she was hearing. She and her family were preparing for a journey of a lifetime - a voyage of exploration through much unknown space, a long journey but one that was sure to be filled with rewards and experience.
chapters.illustration: A father helping his daughter put on a helmet, a token of new beginnings, while the rest of the family wait on the space-craft, looking off in wonder and anticipation.

chapters.title: Good-byes and Parting Ways
chapters.content: The family gathered in the parking lot of their spaceship, saying good-byes to their friends and to the old life they were leaving behind. Sure, there were sad smiles and tears, but soon the conversation turned only to how exciting the journey would be, what new challenges awaited them, and the unknown possibilities that were soon to be discovered.
chapters.illustration: A family of four in a ship's parking lot, teary-eyed and saying their farewells to friends and family as they get ready for their journey.

chapters.title: Countdown to Launch
chapters.content: The countdown process was automated, and before anyone knew it, the engines powered on and the ship lifted off from the launch pad. The view from the windows looked like the star wars movies they had seen, what filled with wonder and joy, and kind of worry of the unknown that awaited them.
chapters.illustration: The family aboard the Space-craft, everyone cheering in excitement, some smaller members of the family crying in surprise and awe, their seats safely strapped in, as the craft slowly lifts off into space.

chapters.title: Nearing the Destination
chapters.content: Our heroes waited patiently and things slowly started to take a different turn, they heard and saw the beautiful colors and shapes of other galaxies, they slowly began to discover that the universe was far more vast and mysterious than ever before thought. Things seemed to be coming together and soon the destination was in view. Every family member felt something, their hearts were excited and enthralled at what was about to unfold, something deep within them stirring in response to the wonders of the cosmos.
chapters.illustration: Our heroes aboard the spaceship, some peeking out of the windows in not just awe but anticipation and reverence, all at a shared understanding of the cosmic wonder outside them.

chapters.title: Arrival at the Destination
chapters.content: Finally, after what seemed like an eternity, their ship docked with the space station. Everyone was beyond excited, and the trip was filled with more adventure than one could imagine. As they disembarked from the craft, conversations amongst them and the other residents of the space station began soon afterwards, each person exchanged stories from their many journeys and all were wowed at the secrets taught by them. It was clear nobody would ever want to leave.
chapters.illustration: The family all disembarking from the space craft into a bustling and bustling space station, wearing looks of curiosity and excitement, with new friends meeting them and exchanging stories and wholes.

chapters.title: Goodnight For Now
chapters.content: Eventually, little Sparky was the last one awake, and despite a million ideas on what she could go take a peek at next, she knew it was time to go to bed. With a knowing smile, she hugged her family goodnight and made it to the bed. Content, she settled in and wished them sweet dreams, closing her eyes and wishing to explore more the next day.
chapters.illustration: Sparky peacefully tucked into a cosy bunk in an area of the space station, gently grinning with a sense of accomplishment to a new adventure ahead.

messages.name: BB
Alex
messages.content:
"""
story outline: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive
"""

messages.name: Assy
